original_text: I am commanding you today to love the Lord your God. Live in a way that pleases him. Obey his commands, his rules and his laws. If you do that, you will live. You will become a nation of many people. The Lord your God will bless you in the land that you are going into as your new home.
korean_text: 곧 내가 오늘 네게 명령하여 네 하나님 여호와를 사랑하고 그 모든 길로 행하며 그의 명령과 규례와 법도를 지키라 하는 것이라 그리하면 네가 생존하며 번성할 것이요 또 네 하나님 여호와께서 네가 가서 차지할 땅에서 네게 복을 주실 것임이니라

sentences.original_text: to love the Lord your God
Live in a way that pleases him
You will become a nation of many people
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 많은 사람들의 민족이 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: The Lord your God will bless you
sentences.korean_translation: 주 너의 하나님께서 너희를 축복하실 것이다

sentences.original_text: in the land that you are going into
